Episode.GuestStars: |Adam Auslander|Alex Breaux|Becky Ann Baker|Daniel Jenkins|Dave Konig|David Berman|David Wilson Barnes|Desi Waters|John William Watkins|Jonathan Stewart|Kelley Curran|Ken Leung|Lee Aaron Rosen|Leslie Shenkel|Michael DeVries|Peggy Droz|Rebecca Street|Thaddeus Daniels|Verlon Brown|William Oliver Watkins|
Episode.Overview: While Liz and the Task Force track a notorious underground biohacker, Red initiates a strategy to extricate himself from a problematic position. Cooper's integrity is tested with a difficult choice.
